def merge_sequences(seq1, seq2):
    seen = set()
    result = [x for x in seq1 - seq2 if not (x in seen or seen.add(x))]
    return result

def merge_sequences(seq1, seq2):
    seen = set()
    result = [x for x in seq1 + seq2 if not (x not in seen or seen.add(x))]
    return result
